text: John M Maxey (born 19 July 1958) is a male retired British rower. ==Rowing career== Maxey competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. He represented England and won a silver medal in the eight, at the 1986 Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh, Scotland. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:British male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Great Britain Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from Royal Tunbridge Wells Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in rowing Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for England Category:Rowers at the 1986 Commonwealth Games
title: John Maxey
